title: Banks: Viewing a Bank Account
body:
Banks: Viewing a Bank Account¶

Banks displays all the bank accounts connected to organizations of the Maha Platform.
Each bank account is associated with a team and displays a status (pending or active).
Refer here to add a new bank account to an organization.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Platform

  3. Click Banks

  4. Click a bank account to view the bank details

  5. Click the hyperlinked BrainTree link to open the account in a separate BrainTree tab

  6. Click and Edit Bank to edit the bank account
toc: • Banks: Viewing a Bank Account
